name: Clinging to vehicles
text: No person riding upon any coaster, roller skates, sled, or toy bicycle or other toy vehicle shall attach it or oneself to any vehicle upon a roadway, and no person riding a bicycle or moped upon any roadway shall attach the bicycle or moped or oneself to any vehicle other than the one the person is riding. [L 1971, c 150, pt of §1; am L 1984, c 273, §11; gen ch 1985]
